author: smuzaffar
body: latest bot [changes](https://github.com/cms-sw/cms-bot/pull/1955/files) make sure that unit test do not generate any data in cmssw/src tree. This is done by dropping the write permissions from the cmssw/src during the PR tests. Whitgh new bot changes the unit test  `test_PixelBaryCentreTool` fails as it can not generate files in the copied `Alignment/MillePedeAlignmentAlgorithm/macros` directory. This PR proposes that tests make sure that the copied directory has write permissions.
title: [unit test] make sure copied directory has write permissions
